Body:
Description: Hi Team, Greetings,

Writing to let you know that we are getting an error message as "Low Disk Space".
What We've Learned Updated: Client is getting a ''Low disk space'' error.
Next Steps Updated: Sent note to follow up on getting the error.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, GANDAY RAKESH KUMAR

What We've Learned Updated: Connected remote to the client's machine and it seems like they have around 200 GB of occupied space by shadows they do not use.

Client said they will have to get approval from their manager before proceeding with deleting the shadows.
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Andrei Pop
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Andrei Pop, GANDAY RAKESH KUMAR

What We've Learned Updated: Connected remote to assist the client with freeing up the space.
Went on and removed the shadows.
From 95% , the occupying space went down to 40.
We deleted only shadows older than 60 days.
Client was satisfied with the fix.
Next Steps Updated: Agreed to close the case.

What We've Learned Updated: 10/04/2025
Connected remote to assist the client with freeing up the space.
Went on and removed the shadows.
From 95% , the occupying space went down to 40.
We deleted only shadows older than 60 days.
Client was satisfied with the fix.

09/05/2024
Client reported that the issue came back and wants to set up another remote session.

12/05/2024
Client did not make a snapshot of his VM therefore we could not carry on with the troubleshooting.
Asked to investigate this on their side and let us know once it's done.
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, Oana Sutoiu, GANDAY RAKESH KUMAR
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, Oana Sutoiu

What We've Learned Updated: 10/04/2025
Connected remote to assist the client with freeing up the space.
Went on and removed the shadows.
From 95% , the occupying space went down to 40.
We deleted only shadows older than 60 days.
Client was satisfied with the fix.

09/05/2024
Client reported that the issue came back and wants to set up another remote session.

12/05/2024
Client did not make a snapshot of his VM therefore we could not carry on with the troubleshooting.
Asked to investigate this on their side and let us know once it's done.

15/05/2024
Connected remote along with Adrian to take a look at the problem.
This time on his server about 94% of the root was occupied by 34 GB file.
Went on, removed it and client went back to just 14% being used.

What We've Learned Updated: 10/04/2025
Connected remote to assist the client with freeing up the space.
Went on and removed the shadows.
From 95% , the occupying space went down to 40.
We deleted only shadows older than 60 days.
Client was satisfied with the fix.

09/05/2025
Client reported that the issue came back and wants to set up another remote session.

12/05/2025
Client did not make a snapshot of his VM therefore we could not carry on with the troubleshooting.
Asked to investigate this on their side and let us know once it's done.

15/05/2025
Connected remote along with Adrian to take a look at the problem.
This time on his server about 94% of the root was occupied by 34 GB file.
Went on, removed it and client went back to just 14% being used.

21/05/2025

Connected remote along with Adrian to sort the issue.
This time, the occupied storage was inside the log /usr , not the shadows.
Went on and removed the unnecessary files that had around 48 GB  and also removed the banner that kept coming up.
Agreed to close the case.
